description: The '''sanâa''' or '''sanâa''' of Algiers ([[arabic]]: الصّنعة, ə-Ṣan'a) or simply the Andalusian, refers to the Algerian Arab-Andalusian [[classical music|classical]] repertoire of the school of [[Algiers]], and which tradition relates to the city of [[Córdoba, Spain|Cordoba]] in [[Al-Andalus]].
